entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:07 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Smithers Airport 05:46 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: SE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023
